markdown:
**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 62 **Prerequisites** [Debilitating Venom](/Feats.aspx?ID=4026); [Moderate Enhance Venom](/Feats.aspx?ID=4030) --- Add one of the following to the debilitations from which you can choose when you [Envenom](/Actions.aspx?ID=1451). These debilitations reduce the damage of all stages as noted.
  • **Bungling** (level 13) Reduce damage by 1 die; **Stage 1** no effect; **Stage 2** [clumsy 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3); **Stage 3** clumsy 2
  • **Devitalizing** (level 13) Reduce damage by 3 dice; **Stage 1** no effect; **Stage 2** [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10); **Stage 3** drained 2
  • **Nauseating** (level 13) Reduce damage by 2 dice; **Stage 1** no effect; **Stage 2** [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34); **Stage 3** sickened 2
  • **Weakening** (level 13) Reduce damage by 1 die; **Stage 1** [enfeebled 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13); **Stage 2** enfeebled 1; **Stage 3** enfeebled 2
**Special** You can select this feat multiple times, choosing a different debilitation each time.
name: Stronger Debilitating Venom
